channel.title: II on Home
channel.description: Recent content in II on Home

item.title: Tier II Heavy Tanks
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.0 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Heavy Tanks by Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Tier II Heavy Tanks
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.1 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Heavy Tanks by Relative WR. item.title: Tier II stats
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier II during update 6.0. Battles per Player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.0. On average, players played 9 battles.
